results.description: Scotland will take on Bangladesh, the Netherlands and Namibia in the first round at next year's T20 World Cup in Australia.
results.shortTitle: Scots face Bangladesh at T20 World Cup
results.title: T20 World Cup: Scotland in Group B with Bangladesh, Netherlands & Namibia

thumbnail.altText: Scotland will be based in Tasmania for the first round of the T20 World Cup

results.description: Scotland beat Oman by five wickets to secure fifth place at the T20 World Cup Qualifier thanks to Matthew Cross' fine 61 not out.
results.shortTitle: Cross leads Scots to fifth-place finish
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland defeat Oman by five runs to secure fifth place

results.description: Scotland secure a place at the T20 World Cup with a convincing 90-run win over hosts United Arab Emirates in their play-off.
results.shortTitle: Scotland qualify for T20 World Cup
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland beat UAE by 90 runs to reach the finals

results.description: Scotland suffer a four-wicket defeat by the Netherlands in the Qualifier and may need a revenge win over the Dutch to reach the T20 World Cup.
results.shortTitle: Scots face play-off after loss to Dutch
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scots wait for play-off after defeat by Netherlands

thumbnail.altText: Scotland lost to the Netherlands by four wickets

results.description: Scotland remain on track to reach the T20 World Cup next summer after a comfortable 46-run win over Bermuda in qualifying.
results.shortTitle: Scots on track after easy Bermuda win
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland on track for knockout phase after routine Bermuda win

results.description: Scotland's T20 World Cup Qualifier campaign suffers another setback with an embarrassing 24-run loss to Namibia.
results.shortTitle: Scots suffer damaging loss to Namibia
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland suffer embarrassing 24-run loss to Namibia

results.description: Josh Davey takes two wickets in the final over as Scotland edge past Papua New Guinea by four runs in the T20 World Cup Qualifier.
results.shortTitle: Scotland earn tense victory over PNG
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland beat Papua New Guinea by four runs

results.description: Scotland get their T20 World Cup qualifying campaign back on track with a comfortable 31-run victory over Kenya in the UAE.
results.shortTitle: Scotland recover to ease past Kenya
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland get campaign back on track in Kenya win

results.description: Scotland suffer a surprise opening defeat in their T20 World Cup Qualifier as Singapore secure a dramatic two-run victory.
results.shortTitle: Scotland suffer surprise opening loss
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland suffer surprise opening loss to Singapore

results.description: George Munsey's 86 helps Scotland beat Ireland by one run in the T20 World Cup qualifier warm-up game in Abu Dhabi.
results.shortTitle: Scotland edge out Irish in warm-up game
results.title: T20 World Cup Qualifier: Scotland edge out Ireland by one run in warm-up game

thumbnail.altText: George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game
George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game

George Munsey's 86 helped Scotland beat Ireland in Tuesday's T20 World Cup warm-up game

results.description: Scotland struggle with the bat as they suffer a 37-run defeat to United Arab Emirates in a warm-up for the T20 World Cup Qualifier.
results.shortTitle: Scotland slump to UAE warm-up defeat
results.title: Scotland lose to UAE in warm-up for T20 World Cup Qualifier

thumbnail.altText: Richie Berrington was Scotland's top scorer with 34 in Dubai

results.description: Gus Mackay says it is an "exciting time" for Scottish cricket after being named the new chief executive of Cricket Scotland.
results.shortTitle: Mackay appointed Cricket Scotland CEO
results.title: Cricket Scotland appoint Gus Mackay as chief executive

results.description: Scotland will host New Zealand in a one-day international on Friday, 26 June, the Blackcaps' first visit to the country since 1999.
results.shortTitle: Scotland to host New Zealand in June
results.title: Scotland to host New Zealand for first time in 21 years

results.description: Ireland capture the Twenty20 tri-series after a tense finish saw them edge Scotland by a single run at Malahide Castle in Dublin.
results.shortTitle: Ireland win series after beating Scots
results.title: Twenty20 tri-series: Ireland clinch series with single-run win over Scotland

results.description: Scotland beat the Netherlands in their Twenty20 tri-series and will face Ireland in the final match on Friday, with the winner clinching the series.
results.shortTitle: Scotland go top with Netherlands win
results.title: Twenty20 tri-series: Scotland go top with Netherlands victory

results.description: Ireland beat Scotland by four wickets with 14 balls to spare in the latest Twenty20 tri-series at Malahide in Dublin.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat Scotland by four wickets
results.title: Twenty20 tri-series: Ireland beat Scotland by four wickets at Malahide

results.description: George Munsey make 127 not out as Scotland open their Twenty20 tri-series in Ireland with victory over the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: Munsey stars as Scotland beat Dutch
results.title: George Munsey his 127 as Scotland beat Netherlands in series opener

results.description: Reports, results and scorecards from the Twenty20 tri-series hosted by Ireland, also featuring Scotland and the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: Scotland & Netherlands in Ireland 2019
results.title: Scotland & Netherlands in Ireland 2019 - Twenty20 tri-series

thumbnail.altText: Ireland's Niall O'Brien and Scotland's Safyaan Sharif

results.description: Scotland have selected a "robust and versatile" squad for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifier, says head coach Shane Burger.
results.shortTitle: Scots name T20 World Cup Qualifier squad
results.title: Scotland announce squad for ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifier

thumbnail.altText: Calum MacLeod (left) and Craig Wallace are in the Scotland squad

results.description: Scotland's hopes of reaching the Women's T20 World Cup are over after a 13-run defeat by Bangladesh in Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Scotland's T20 World Cup hopes over
results.title: Women's T20 World Cup Qualifier: Defeat by Bangladesh ends Scotland's hopes

altText: Scotland are hosting the Women's T20 World Cup Qualifier in Forfar and Arbroath
